title: Modern Pedagogy Workshop for Simulation/VR-Based Science Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Learners conduct experiment-centered science education simulations using VR devices and receive real-time feedback through formative assessments

learning_goals: They can explain the core principles of technology-enhanced teaching methods in VR/simulation environments.
They perform data collection and analysis processes through science experiment simulations with 80% accuracy.
They can revise learning strategies based on feedback-driven formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
